name: Bark! - Dog Translator
description:
Want to communicate with your dog? Hit record and translate your voice into woofs! The Bark! - Dog Translator also includes 16 different dog sounds and a soundboard with 9 different sound effects! Download now and start speaking the language of your dog!


- Sounds & Woofs:

The Dog Translator contains 16 dog sounds from cute whimpers to loud barks! 9 more sounds that dogs often react to include a doorbell, dog toys, a storm, a whistle, an ambulance, a puppy and much more! Your dog will go crazy for this app!

"5/5 Woofs!" - Your dog


Disclaimer: This app is intended for entertainment purposes only.

Note: Dogs often respond to the sounds produced by this app. If your pet displays signs of distress or aggression, discontinue use immediately.
